title: Fartgate isn't going away by making an even greater PR disaster on the opposite direction
body: So Riot got exposed for having a toxic internal culture of high-ups farting on subordinate faces, making rape jokes, the founders telling subordinates to fellate them and managers telling people imagining them having sex with their wives as topic openers. Now you're making gender segregated panels and then having Rioters using their twitter accounts that are publicly linked to their jobs at Riot to insult people complaining about said segregation. You don't solve a PR disaster by making an even bigger one to eclipse it ffs.
